metadata.synopsis: The hostages react to one of the group's death, but resolve to keep going for their sake.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Plays automatically if any one prisoner in the group dies. The others react.

0.speaker: Marlono Rhandle
0.text: Shit, she's dead. Got... to... keep... moving...

1.speaker: Deedle Ofran
1.text: NO! Damn it... We were so close to getting out.
